core.planner
Class DecompositionList

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.ArrayList<Decomposition>
              core.planner.DecompositionList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Standardizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Decomposition>, java.util.Collection<Decomposition>, java.util.List<Decomposition>, java.util.RandomAccess
public final class DecompositionList
extends java.util.ArrayList<Decomposition>
implements Standardizable, java.lang.Cloneable

The DecompositionList class implements a list of decompositions. this class stores the possible decompositions of a method a, d represents the tail part of a method (C1 T1 C2 T2 ... Cn Tn).

See Also:
